description: The little brother of Mammut's Taiss Light: Taiss Tour Mid GTX® Men for minimum weight and maximum performance. This mountaineering boot with a crampon insert on the back combines innovative technologies. With naturally shaped cuts, Mammut Georganic Technology gives the boot an optimum fit and outstanding comfort. Contact Control provides precision and a lighter weight while Vibram Litebase reduces the weight of the sole for maximum performance. Taiss Tour - a mountaineering boot with cutting-edge technologies.
name: Mammut Taiss Tour Mid GTX - Mens
